metadata.title: CVE-2016-6707 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability in System Server in Android 6.xbefore 2016-11-01 and 7.0 before 2016-11-01 could enable a local maliciousapplication to execute arbitrary code within the context of a privilegedprocess. This issue is rated as High because it could be used to gain localaccess to elevated capabilities, which are not normally accessible to athird-party application. Android ID: A-31350622.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
